item.description:
The Beach to Beach race course will take participants through Marblehead's Goldthwait neighborhood looping back across the Marblehead Causeway, around beautiful Flint Street and back to Devereaux Beach to the finish line. Day of Race Registration begins at 8:00 am and will end at 9:45 am. Cash and check will be accepted We can go out for lunch on the beach after the walk/run. To register online: http://www.active.com/running/marblehead-ma/beach-to-beach-5k-walkrun-2011.

Registration fee is $17.00
item.why: To be healthy and have fun at the same time. All proceeds from this race will go directly to women and children's charities on Boston's North Shore.
item.name: 5K Walk/Run
